pages.text: $(li)The Witch is a creature that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:structures/witch_house)Swamp Witch Hut$(/l), $(l:patchouli:structures/maple_witch_house)Maple Witch Hut$(/l), and in the $(l:patchouli:structures/witch_tower)Witch Tower$(/l).$(br)$(li)They are able to throw $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/poison)Poison Potions$(/l) to you.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/sugar)Sugar$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/gunpowder)Gunpowder$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/end_remastered/witch_pupil)Witch Pupil$(/l), $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/redstone)Redstone$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/glowstone_dust)Glowstone$(/l), $(l:patchouli:potions/buzzier_bees/luck)Luck$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/healing)Healing Potions$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/glass_bottle)Glass Bottles$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/stick)Sticks$(/l) upon death.
When they have low health, they will drink a $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/healing)Healing Potion$(/l), don't let them do it.
